hero.title: Rayan Radio
hero.subtitle: The Most Popular Syrian Radio in the Southern Region
hero.description: From Jabal al-Arab to the plains of Hauran, the Sham desert, Quneitra and the Golan
hero.aboutText: Rayan Radio is the first private radio that provides diverse content covering various community interests and focuses on reviving heritage. It broadcasts from the heart of As-Suwayda city in southern Syria and extends across the entire Syrian map. It provides listeners with accurate and objective radio service. Founded in 2009, since its establishment it has been considered the first station of its kind that specialized in reviving heritage and folk heritage and spreading Nabati poetry.
hero.missionText: At Rayan Radio, we are keen to adopt the latest mechanisms in the field of audio media to be a media platform that keeps pace with an era where competition has become intense. Therefore, we have committed to professionalism and neutrality in our monitoring, follow-ups and coverage, and we have adhered to respecting the listener's mind by providing quality social, cultural and artistic content.

testimonials.title: Listener Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our listeners say about Rayan Radio

ahmad.name: Ahmad
ahmad.text: Rayan Radio's podcast is a main source for me in enhancing my knowledge of Syrian folk heritage. I am grateful for the valuable and diverse content provided by the podcast, which helped me gain a deep understanding of my country's history and culture.

lina.name: Lina
lina.text: Thanks to the podcast, I found myself close to my country's heritage and cultural landmarks. The podcast is an excellent companion in the journey of exploring Syrian history and heritage, and I highly recommend it to anyone interested in culture and heritage.

shadi.name: Shadi
shadi.text: I cannot thank the Rayan Radio team enough for the wonderful efforts they make in providing high-quality and diverse content. The podcast has added a lot to my knowledge of my country's heritage and traditional Syrian lifestyle.

about.teamIntro: The distinguished team at Rayan Radio is pleased to welcome you with love and hospitality. We are an enthusiastic team committed to our mission of providing high-quality content to our valued audience. The team at Rayan Radio includes a group of professionals and specialists in their fields, and we work in cooperation and harmony to achieve our goals and vision. We believe in the importance of teamwork, exchanging ideas and cooperation, and we strive to build a positive and motivating work environment that contributes to achieving success and excellence.
